column4: hi all. I accidentally formated my external disk to fat32 and have this overwhelming feeling of dread passed on me. I lost 230gb of data. Is there a way to recover or restore this?
hi all. I accidentally formated my external disk to fat32 and have this overwhelming feeling of dread passed on me. I lost 230gb of data. Is there a way to recover or restore this?
Not easily... if it's really important, drop it off to a data recovery place
